text: The men's sprint K-4 (kayak four) 500 metres competition at the 2018 Asian Games was held from 29 to 30 August 2018. ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | rowspan="2"|Wednesday, 29 August 2018 || 08:50 || Heats |- | 16:10 || Semifinal |- | Thursday, 30 August 2018 || 08:40 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} == Results == === Heats === * Qualification: 1–3 → Final (QF), Rest → Semifinal (QS) ==== Heat 1 ==== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Team !width=80|Time !width=50|Notes |-bgcolor="ccffcc" |1 |align=left| Ilya Golendov Alexey Dergunov Sergii Tokarnytskyi Yevgeniy Alexeyev |1:25.457 || QF |-bgcolor="ccffcc" |2 |align=left| Ahmad Reza Talebian Peyman Ghavidel Ali Aghamirzaei Amin Boudaghi |1:28.469 || QF |-bgcolor="ccffcc" |3 |align=left| Aditep Srichart Thoedsak Sonthi Wattana Chitphantulap Chanrit Chakkhian |1:34.693 || QF |-bgcolor="#ffffcc" |4 |align=left| Abdusattor Gafurov Zohirjon Nabiev Saidilhomkhon Nazirov Tokhir Nurmukhammadi |1:37.380 || QS |-bgcolor="#ffffcc" |5 |align=left| Albert Raj Selvaraj A. Chingching Singh L.
